website_summaries.verdict: Great if you're trying to be environmentally friendly, but some have found the bristles are too hard.
pros: Bristles are well-shaped to get in between your teeth
cons: Bristles are more coarse than some were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Like a massage for your mouth!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie... this is the best toothbrush I have ever used in my life. I never thought I'd be missing out on a dang toothbrush. It's like a massage for your teeth. The bristles are really well shaped to get in between your teeth. I originally thought this would be too big for my mouth as I have a very small mouth but the soft bristles work well! I'll never buy a normal boring toothbrush ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortalbe in Hand, and Wonderful Replacement for Plastic Toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toothbrush, and feels good in your hand when using it. The handle is curved perfectly for hand comfort. The bristles were the best surprise, in my opinion. They are perfect for me, although I feel that they are closer to a medium bristle than a soft bristle. I love knowing that this toothbrush is Eco-friendly. Everything is biodegradable - yet highly durable - and is a fantastic replacement for those old-fashioned, typical, Earth-destroying plastic toothbrushes we're all used to. I recommend giving these a try! Slowly but surely we can all change one thing at a tijme to reduce our environmental impact.
customer_reviews.author: hhfoco

customer_reviews.title: I really liked trying these out
customer_reviews.text: I really liked trying these out! I got some Charcoal whitening treatment and didn't want to ruin my nice soniccare brush so I got these to go with it. I like how it looks and it made me feel good that I was buying toothbrushes that had a lot less plastic i.e., better for the environment. A couple of downsides: the first time using I had some bristles come out in my mouth which wasn't horrible just a little inconvenient. Also I like my bristles a little harder but on the flip side if you have sensitive gums these may not be the brushes for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kalinda

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these toothbrushes! The handle is smooth, perfectly shaped, and easy for small or large hands to hold. The bristles are cut impeccably and are really high quality. Overall, this is a better built product than standard plastic toothbrushes and it cleans infinitely better too. I bought them because 1) My whole family needed new toothbrushes 2) I wanted to avoid plastic products 3) I had always heard about charcoal being really good for your teeth and gums. Nailed it on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: they are environmentally friendly and packaged in recyclable boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I waited 3 months to review so I would know how the brushes hold up. No issues with splinters in my mouth from the bamboo handles or bristles coming out. Like that they are charcoal infused. Love that they are environmentally friendly and packaged in recyclable boxes. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these brushes and I can feel eco friendly using them. The only thing to maybe keep in mind is that the bristles are a little on the softer side compared to the commercial plastic toothbrushes, but it doesn't seem to affect the way my teeth turn out. Comes in a pack of four so you are good for the year! Would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Splinters and cuts... They're soft though..
customer_reviews.text: I really like the soft bristles, I've used 3 of these brushes so far, so I bought more, but I've ended up injuring my mouth the last 4 times I've brushed. The wood gave me a splinter in the back of my mouth behind my molars, and I have found cuts on my cheeks, tongue, and corners of my mouth.... I really liked them so I'm disappointed with this batch I received.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It's om
customer_reviews.text: These are okay but I personally don't like the feeling of wood like this. You know how some people get goose bumps from different textures? For some it's peaches, sound on nails on a chalkboard, etc. Well.. for me it's wood so you can imagine how difficult it was for me to get over this. I also think my toothbrush might've molded after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fell off heavily with use
customer_reviews.text: Have used three of the different toothbrushes in the kit and all have severely lost the bristles and has been quite painful when it happens while brushing. I was hoping to find a eco friendly option that’s reliable. Maybe I got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these brushes to specifically go along with the charcoal toothpaste. I love using these brushes. It fits in your hand so nicely and is comfortable brushing your teeth. I like that they are so natural. I will definitely order them again. the quality is very good and they are fairly inexpensive. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A great toothbrush with a grown-up aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I hate the pseudo-ergonomic shapes and garish colors plastic brushes come in. This brush comfortable to use and is not an eye-sore. Good brush and its bristles are quite resilient without being hard. I will continue to buy them as long as they are made.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these toothbrushes whitened my teeth but I have noticed that my oral health has improved. Well I've changed the products that I use and opted for unconventional ones and I have seen an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: 10 of 10 will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like these brushes more than I thought I would. A subtle, comfortable change from a medium bristle brush. After about 3 weeks of use, no bristles have fallen out that I've noticed. Comfortable grip and easy around the gum line without being too soft. I can't say if the charcoal is making a big difference, but I can say I will buy these brushes from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ray+Min

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be tweaked
customer_reviews.text: These are a great idea, but I had a couple issues. The brushes were too rigid and brushes that are too rigid will scratch most people's gums. The second issue I had was that after a bit more than a week of usage the wood around where your mouth sits begins to feel as though it might splinter into your inner lips.
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: Nice toothbrush and eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: First thing's first, don't expect this to whiten your teeth. Other than that, this is a great toothbrush if you don't mind wooden toothbrushes and a medium bristle (I know some people who don't like the idea of a wooden toothbrush). I like medium to hard bristles so this suits me well. I really love that it is biodegradable and isn't contributing to landfill or more plastic production!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Like that it's environmental
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's environmental, packaging was good, etc. However, each time I have brushed my teeth with it (about a week now) I get a bristle or two stuck in my teeth or loose in my mouth. It cleans really well, grip is good, length and size of bristle head all good. Just wondering if the brush will survive the three months of brushing with enough bristles to clean...lol.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toothbrushes at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are great. My teeth feel super clean after using them. They definitely feel a bit different than a plastic toothbrush in the mouth, but you get used to it! I love that these are so much more sustainable than other brush options, and they’re GREAT quality. Haven’t had any bristles fall out and the handle feels smooth and comfortable in my hand. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Monroe

customer_reviews.title: These are a wonderful alternative to standard toothbrushes - the bristles are BPA ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful alternative to standard toothbrushes - the bristles are BPA free and I love that it is made from a sustainable wood. I bought these because I don't want BPA in my mouth at all, even for the relatively nominal amount of time it takes to brush one's teeth. The company is eco-conscious which is something I definitely value and appreciate - and the packaging is made from 100% recycled products + it's biodegradable. I will be buying again once I need to restock.
customer_reviews.author: gla

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are nice
customer_reviews.text: Bristle are not too soft or too hard. Packaging is eco friendly but I feel each brush in the pack didn’t need a cardboard encasing. At least there wasn’t plastic. Not sure what the infused charcoal brushes are supposed to do . Over all a good alternative to a plastic toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: S.Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush is very lightweight and comfortable to hold and use. I really like that it's biodegradable. I haven't been using it long enough to confirm the whitening capability.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: These will be  great stocking stuffers! Love that they are all natural
customer_reviews.text: With a household of 8 we go through a lot of toothbrushes. It’s important to have something that is bio-degradable but also of good quality. These toothbrushes are awesome. I love that the bristles have the activated charcoal in the bristles. I bought these for my husband and I to try before getting more, as soon as my daughter heard they were all natural she came and swiped my extra one. This will definetly be on the Christmas present list this year. They fit in your hand great, they feel great while brushing, and you don’t feel guilty when you throw them away. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been starting reducing the plastic I use in the house. These were the first brushes I tried and I absolutely love them! I've heart of bamboo tooth brushes causing splinters or bristles falling out easily- I have not had this issue and i'm a few toothbrushes in! My boyfriend is not all about this no plastic thing but he loves how durable and sturdy these brushes are- he likes a firm bristle, these are soft but firm not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Ecofriendly
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy sustainable products and was glad to see that someone had though to use bamboo (a rapidly growing material) to replace the hard plastic of toothbrushes. The bamboo material made me feel less guilty of throwing away the first brush after having been sick. The soft brushes are great for massaging your gums.
customer_reviews.author: David Mora

customer_reviews.title: MEDIUM-SOFT Bristle. Not quite Medium.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I LOVe that these are environmentally friendly and biodegradable. I was under the impression that the bristles on these brushes would be Medium, but they are are what you might expevct from the supermarket as SOFT. Maybe even a Medium-Soft. These Bristles are not quite medium, and definetly not a hard bristle. A slight let down, but lesson learned for next purchase. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Khalil

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Like the whole brush from handle to bristles. Quality and price are great. Very fast shipping. Had them the next day via Amazon prime
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: What I didn't expect was how good they would feel on my teeth and gums
customer_reviews.text: I bought these toothbrushes because I thought they would be more environmentally conscious. And in my opinion they are. What I didn't expect was how good they would feel on my teeth and gums. I normally don't write product reviews, but these toothbrushes are AMAZING. They make you want to brush your teeth. I don't see how any dentist would not agree with these toothbrushes. They FEEL great. EDIT: I tried another bamboo toothbrushes they weren't as good. This one has sturdy bristles, unlike the others. However, the bristles are still soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Michelle Wesley

customer_reviews.title: A very hip alternative
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a very picky hipster so when I started going more green it was hard to get him to change his routine. He love the look and packaging and I love the act that they were green, had green packaging and came in a three pack!
customer_reviews.author: Diana G

customer_reviews.title: eco-friendly awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same tooth brush for over a year and the bristles are still stiff and perfect. Only about 4 to 5 bristles fell put after the first week of using. I still have 3 brushes left. This is the best tooth brush I've ever owned! I love the fact it's made of natural material. I never want to go back to plastic! I will say that the only down side is the top base of the bamboo is pretty thick, so if you have a small mouth I dont recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My children use these
customer_reviews.text: Good toothbrushes, the company tells you if any bristles come out that they will send a replacement. I accidentally got my children these (I meant to order the childrens size) and they like them
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah & Ashliah

customer_reviews.title: Extension past bristles
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try a bamboo tooth brush. I like softness of the bristles, however, The handle continues past the bristles too far for my small pallet to handle. I have gagged several times while using this product. That being said I will continue to use it to see if it helps in whitening but next time I will order the child size.
customer_reviews.author: lauren bur

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow and it feels like the bristles get hung up in between your teeth. Maybe I can find one with a fuller head.
customer_reviews.author: Warriorfish74

customer_reviews.title: I love these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes! After having braces, my teeth were so jammed together that regular toothbrush bristles didn't really do their job. These brushes met my desire for the environment, I was extra surprised that they cleaned my teeth so well! I will continue to buy these as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: Danita Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are wimpy plastic, wooden head thick and cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried these brushes in an attempt to reduce our plastic footprint, but we did not like the thick wooden head feel in our mouths and it actually was an obstacle to reach our molars. Also, the bristles are plastic and kind of wimpy, several bristles fell out. Not a fan. We threw out the ones we tried, stored the remaining, and have gone back to the traditional plastic brushes.
customer_reviews.author: klood

customer_reviews.title: Such a great surprise that this not only is more environmentally friendly ...
customer_reviews.text: My main motivation in buying this product was to decrease my plastic output, but after trying this toothbrush out only a couple times, I can already say that I will continue to use this type of toothbrush for its cleaning abilities! Such a great surprise that this not only is more environmentally friendly but also provides a MUCH BETTER CLEAN than my plastic toothbrush. I plan to give one to everyone I know next holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: gave these a shot to recycle, wouldn't recommend, stick with a motor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: They're very steady and soft, portraying an organic and clean feeling to the eyes and mouth (although it might sound weird to say that about a toothbrush) That feeling is reflected in their presentation, which is very simple and light. If you're seeking an organic toothbrush, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Taisiya N.

customer_reviews.title: Once you go natural, you never go back..
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this product very much and don't think I'll be going back. I've been using these brushes with Dr. Bronners toothpaste and it makes my teeth feel perfectly clean and plaque free, even better than brushing with regular toothbrush/toothpaste. When I first used the product a few bristles fell out but it was no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan S

customer_reviews.title: Great - Better than Boars' Hair Bristles
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm nearly 100% satisfied. My only quibble is that your beautifully packaged product arrived encased in plastic bubble wrap, tarnishing the overall sustainability story. Other than that, they're great. Other 100% biodegradable toothbrushes I've used, with boars' hair bristles, have been too soft. These are much firmer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Head too big, can't reach all places of mouth
customer_reviews.text: The product is great looking aesthetically, but functionally the wood is too thick on the head of the brush and you can't reach in the back of your teeth. I feel that the toothbrush is quite clunky and doesn't feel great in the mouth. Bristles are good though. Wish I would have ordered other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Earth Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these. They are well made. I especially appreciate that not only are they biodegradable aside from the bristles, the packaging is also recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Glenshee Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the design of the product itself is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot more soft than I thought it would be. Otherwise the design of the product itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Wong

customer_reviews.title: Misses the Mark on Price, Recyclability, and Efficiency
customer_reviews.text: After the first week of use, the shaft begins to retain water and ostensibly bacteria, producing a foul odor. The bristles do not last as long, nor are as effective as traditional toothbrush bristles. When the brush needs replacing, the bristles do not come out of the shaft very easily and are nearly impossible to recycle. All in all, I'd recommend a Boie USA if you're looking for something that is both effective and easier on the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great start to going Eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my toothbrushes, and I am very happy they are eco-friendly. They do shed a bit, but that's to be accepted because they aren't stuck to plastic. All in all a great and affordable toothbrush bunch!
customer_reviews.author: cyberstephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not great for people with small mouths.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this toothbrush because of the eco-friendly aspect but the design is just overwhelming for the size of my mouth. It would be nice if they were offered in different sizes. As it stands, I cannot turn the toothbrush in my mouth to get the back of my last molars, it's too large and oafish. The wood grain also rubs slightly uncomfortably against the corners of my lips. Will look for a smaller option next time.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Loving this toothbrush! Gave one to my brother as ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this toothbrush! Gave one to my brother as a gift and he usually destroys his toothbrushes but so far its been holding up for him! We both noticed that our teeth feel so much cleaner with these brushes. On my way to convert the rest of my family to use bamboo toothbrushes as opposed to nasty plastic ones. Also it is a bit more on the medium side for stiffness. -Update 15 July 2016- Still love these brushes however the new black ones are a bit soft. They still clean well but I've got to work it more than the last ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cateline Perrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipment. Each toothbrush is individually packaged in its own paper box (within the pack that contains all four), not sure what that's about.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Softness, BPA free, safety
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my wife. She loves the softness and to use for brushing the tongue..This is the 3rd time I have ordered the bambu tooth brushes for her. There were a couple times some bristles came loose, but otherwise durable.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Fonce

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging, quick delivery, sturdy... good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: I have always use super soft toothbrushes so this will take some getting used to
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Feels very similar to a normal toothbrush, only change ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels very similar to a normal toothbrush, only change in my daily routine is that this toothbrush should not be put in a toothbrush holder that allows liquid to gather at the bottom, because it will seep into the wood.
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY LIKE THIS BRAND OF TOOTHBRUSH
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THIS BRAND OF TOOTHBRUSH !!! MY TEETH FEEL GREAT !!! I ALSO ORDERED SOME FOR MY GRANDSON !!! I HAVE USED THEM FOR GIFTS AND PLAN TO ORDER MORE !!! THANK YOU FOR MAKING AN EARTH FRIENDLY PRODUCT TOO !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mylinda Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Really like these
customer_reviews.text: Great. Still on first brush (sanitizing it weekly ) and haven't lost a single bristle. Bristles are definitely on the soft side, so find that I brush longer, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: INDUSTRY

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I just don't know how to get the bristles out to dispose of it properly but it does it's job and is durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wood feels weird while brushing. its a little abrasive.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the wooden part of brush kind of sticks to my lips and doesn't glide too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M. Platter

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Fall Out in Mouth
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first, but within a few weeks the bristles fall out and it is an awful feeling - makes me gag trying to remove them from my mouth. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: I Like the Softer Brush
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are softer than the ones I usually buy so I think I'm going to start stocking these, instead. I'm super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: These are great tooth brushes
customer_reviews.text: These are great tooth brushes, however just a warning: I used one of these on a trip recently and stored it in one of those plastic tooth brush containers. Perhaps it is my fault for not letting the wooden handle dry all the way, but from the last time I used it to maybe 24 hour later when I got home and started to unpack, the handle had started to grow mold. So, either make sure the handle has time to dry properly or don't store it in a tooth brush travel container. Otherwise, it's a nice tooth brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I love these tooth brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these tooth brushes. They are sturdy and not the negative environmental impact a standard plastic toothbrush leaves behind.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These make my gums bleed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but they made my gums bleed. Wouldn't buy them again unless they made the bristles softer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mouth feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the bamboo feels in my mouth, like a tongue depressor. Does not collect dry crusted toothpaste like the plastic handles. I just enjoy these over the plastic ones. Also, I plan to compost it when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Rat

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok!!
customer_reviews.text: I think the brushes are just ok. The bristles are smaller than I'd like and don't cover much of my tooth area.
customer_reviews.author: BetRMe

customer_reviews.title: Harsh On Gums
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the toothbrush, I noticed my mouth felt soooo sore afterward. My gums hurt and my teeth hurt as well. The next time I tried to use the toothbrush more gently, but when brushing toward the gum area, it just really hurts...
customer_reviews.author: Izabela Berile

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but I did have a couple bristles come off in my mouth while brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toothbrush but a bit too soft for my standards (but it says soft so it's my mistake). I like the idea about being sustainable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Great product 2nd time buying. A+ toothbrush minus the plastic waste of a normal tooth brush
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hays

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Will continue to buy once they run out. I didn't know that these supposedly whiten the teeth. I haven't noticed any differences.
customer_reviews.author: Jael

customer_reviews.title: I like these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I like these toothbrushes! After watching this news report on how much trash we produce, i started making my own tooth paste and using biodegradable toothbrushes. They hold up pretty well and i like that they won't just go into a landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Mike da Bear

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are very soft, not medium. I will use them, but will probably not by again as I am looking for a bamboo toothbrush with medium bristles as this one was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will order again, and again, and AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of toothbrushes! Soft bristles, gentle on gums, yet firm enough to get teeth clean. I love the dark bristles which keeps it looking clean when brushing with charcoal teeth whitening powder on a regular basis. This is my second buy - one for everyone in the family! Definitely an item for 1-click re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Trang D.

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! They are very aesthetically pleasing. I was worried about getting splinters from the wood but that has not once happened and I have been using these for a few months now. The bristles last a long time and maintain their shape. Also, they are very soft and not harsh on gums, but still give your teeth a good enough scrub to get them clean. Will purchase again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: peach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after viewing several other options. The brushes are amazing! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M

customer_reviews.title: You dont need any other tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: I would not go back to using plastic toothbrushes for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Paul

customer_reviews.title: Feels unpleasant
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these, but it just felt too splintery and weird. I tried brushing with one and it was awful. Nice idea, poor excecution
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The bristles tend to fall out a bit so don't brush too hard but otherwise was a great purchase. Bristles are soft and the wooden handle is smooth. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: I think I have found my new favorite toothbrush! There was a woodsy-odor when I took them out of the package, but they sat on the counter for a day and there was no funny taste when I used it. I love how firm they are - makes it extra effective when I brush my tongue. I am certainly sticking with these ones!
customer_reviews.author: ReneeMisty

customer_reviews.title: Love these, give them a try
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Trying to move from plastic to bamboo since it's fast regrowing/sustainable. Once the bristles start falling out I know it's time to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Toothbrush ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toothbrush I have ever used. I have tender gums and these bristles are soft, yet do a good job of cleaning my teeth. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Miechell W. Duce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My teeth feel so clean. I feel great because I am using less plastic. This is a solid toothbrush that works just as well, if not better, than all of the major plastic using brands.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Larry

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the toothbrushes, and very happy with the packaging, I order things like this to produce less plastic waste in our world, other things ship covered in plastic. This came in a recycled box, very happy and this is second time ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: otherwise this is a fine product.
customer_reviews.text: I still have not gotten used to the wooden handle on the inside of my mouth, otherwise this is a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Your plastic toothbrush will outlive you by centuries. Buy these instead :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandie McAllister

customer_reviews.title: I like the soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft bristles. Got the firm for my spouse. He said it wasn't firm enough. For me, a toothbrush is a toothbrush. I like the design. It does taste like wood since it's made of bamboo. Just expect that. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes! I have only brushed a few times, but so far they seem to be of great quality. The feeling of bamboo in your mouth (in comparison to plastic) is weird at first, but pretty easy to get used to. I am excited to further be more eco friendly by using these toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Roth

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush on the market today
customer_reviews.text: As good as any toothbrush from the store, except it is made of renewable materials and is compost-able. Price competitive, no need to buy non-renewable plastic brushes anymore!
customer_reviews.author: BookTraveler

customer_reviews.title: just like any other toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: they feel flimsy but they do last. nothing special but good toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: NotFromAJedi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the brush. Very gentle and soft. It's easy to clean up too, no toothpaste left on after.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin Kostov

customer_reviews.title: Great Environmental Choice
customer_reviews.text: Been using these brushes for a few months, and I love them! The softness of the bristles took time to get used to, but they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it! It may take someone some time to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! It may take someone some time to get used to the feeling of bamboo as opposed to plastic, but that is nothing to worry about. Very light weight and I love that I’m helping the environment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, great, does the job of cleaning teeth. Polish and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: I purchased them to use with another product for teeth whitening and they look beautiful and came packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: These bamboo tootbbrushes were exactly as I expected. I purchased them to use with another product for teeth whitening and they look beautiful and came packaged very well. I am very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: My boys seem to like them. I know I do!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Clutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: i bought this toothbrush because it is more sustainable. i love the cardboard package it come in too.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bristles feel soft but after a short while it does hurt the gums. Use with caution.
customer_reviews.author: John Falto

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Good wooden tooth brush .very different from oother. tooth brushes
customer_reviews.author: black suga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for sensitive gums. These toothbrushes last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love my bmbu brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love my bmbu brushes! They’re a great alternative to plastic. My only complaint is that the bristles are a little more harsh on my gums than previous tooth brushes, and having he option to get softer bristles would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and it's packaging the company did a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it's packaging the company did a great job on that. The only problem I had was that the bristles seem to soft for me, other then that my family n I enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: emily derr

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's bamboo
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's bamboo, but i wish it were softer, I can't really use it as it's a bit too harsh for me. Also the size of the brush itself is a bit awkward. Like the idea of it, but can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Batsuren

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes! They are just as described, & very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Marie

product_meta.title: Bamboo Toothbrush 4 Pack - Medium/Soft Charcoal Bristles Tooth Brushes Wooden Handle - BPA Free, Eco Friendly, Vegan Product Gift Idea, Sustainably Grown in Recycled Biodegradable Packaging
feature_bullets: Bamboo Charcoal Toothbrush - Premium quality bamboo toothbrushes for adults in 100% recycled biodegradable eco-friendly packaging. Our eco toothbrush is biodegradable and suistainably grown with organic natural bamboo, making it the perfect vegan gift idea for under $20.

Use with Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder- Use our bamboo toothbrushes with your favorite bamboo charcoal brushing powder. Get started on your tooth whitener routine with charcoal powder and our charcoal bamboo toothbrush.

Vegan Gift Idea - our wooden toothbrush makes the perfect personal toothbrush, guest bathroom toothbrush, travel toothbrush & camping toothbrush -- perfect gift idea for friends, family - an even better vegan gift for women or men!
Non-Toxic - BPA free, Phthalate free, PVC free. Biodegradable & compostable
Ergonomic - toothbrush handle, gentle deep cleaning bristle shape, aesthetic design bamboo wood look
